title: The Priestess
description: Just because you don’t believe in magic,Doesn’t mean it can’t believe in you.Sydney Barrows makes a living out of digging up the dead. Well, not a living, exactly, but a very small stipend. When the end of the world crashes down around her, she didn’t expect to be caught right in the middle of it. Now she’s gone from digging up the dead to worrying about becoming one of them. Aided by a mysterious stranger hiding his own secrets, together, they must race against time to uncover the truth about Sydney’s own past, before it destroys her.
author: L.A. McGinnis
